Signature, Title, and Inscription

In plate in black: [Painted by Canaletti   Engraved by John Bromley/ THE RIALTO/ From the Picture in the possession of James Stuart Wortly, Esq'r. M.P./ GEMS OF ART PLATE 25]; in pencil on sheet: {2-220]
